    • play

      public void play(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws IOException
      This method is called when the playButton is pressed and changes the Scene to the login
      Parameters:
      e - is the event that caused the changed, in this case a click from the mouse
      Throws:
      IOException - in case a fxml file is not found
